Class BrickFactory

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.bricks.BrickFactory
public class BrickFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating Brick instances. Implements the Factory Design Pattern to centralize brick creation logic.

This factory maps integer types (0-6) to specific brick implementations:

  • 0 - I-Brick (straight line)
  • 1 - J-Brick (L-shape, left)
  • 2 - L-Brick (L-shape, right)
  • 3 - O-Brick (square)
  • 4 - S-Brick (S-shape)
  • 5 - T-Brick (T-shape)
  • 6 - Z-Brick (Z-shape)

  • Method Details

    • getBrick

      public static Brick getBrick(int type)
      Creates and returns a Brick instance based on the specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - the brick type (0-6). Values outside this range will result in IllegalArgumentException
      Returns:
      a new Brick instance of the specified type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the type is not in the valid range [0, 6]
